adidas-intro: adidas Design Language is the design system and component library made for adidas, Reebok and Yeezy websites.
elisa-intro: Elisa is one of the largest 5G service providers in Finland. Elisa 5G webshop provides 5G smart phones, SIM cards, and accessories etc.
esg-intro: Green Carbon Neutrality is an ESG report platform that serves HKEX listed companies.
kawaii-intro: Kawaii Dream is a Finnish webshop of Japanese ACG related products.
